data.why:
The WikiGateway module which provides a single API for interacting
    with a number of different wiki engines.

    Also, the Server2 module (name will probably be changed..) which is
    a Perl module that others can subclass in order make an Atom
    protocol web service.

    More information can be found at:

    http://interwiki.sourceforge.net/cgi-bin/wiki.pl?WikiGateway

    http://interwiki.sourceforge.net/cgi-bin/wiki.pl?AtomServerModule
